title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
introduction: Spaghetti Carbonara is a traditional Italian dish from Rome. This rich and creamy pasta is made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. It's a perfect comfort food that is both satisfying and delicious.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. In a pan, cook pancetta with garlic until crispy.
3. Beat eggs and mix with cheese.
4. Combine pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and mix in egg mixture.
5. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
introduction: Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular dish in Indian cuisine that features grilled chicken chunks simmered in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce. This flavorful dish is known for its perfect blend of spices and is often enjoyed with naan or rice.
